tool_description: Processes customer opt-out and unsubscribe requests, updating preferences and ensuring compliance with regulations.

opt_out_type.description: Type of opt-out: all_marketing, specific_type, channel_specific, complete_suppression

notification_type.description: Specific notification type if opt_out_type is specific_type

channel_type.description: Specific channel if opt_out_type is channel_specific

opt_out_source.description: Source of opt-out: email_link, website, phone, in_person

error_messages: Customer not found: The provided customer_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid opt-out type: opt_out_type must be one of: all_marketing, specific_type, channel_specific, complete_suppression.
Missing notification type: notification_type is required when opt_out_type is specific_type.
Missing channel type: channel_type is required when opt_out_type is channel_specific.
Invalid opt-out source: opt_out_source must be one of: email_link, website, phone, in_person.
usage: Provide customer_id and opt_out_type. Include notification_type or channel_type as required based on the opt-out type.

success.description: Whether the opt-out was processed successfully

updated_preferences.description: List of preference settings that were updated

suppression_added.description: Whether customer was added to suppression list

confirmation_sent.description: Whether opt-out confirmation was sent to customer
